newsitem.title: UK: Bankers Trust sets warrants on Roche.
newsitem.headline: Bankers Trust sets warrants on Roche.

text.p: Bankers Trust International Plc has issued 20 million American-style call warrants on Roche Holding AG, lead manager Bankers Trust AG said.
STRIKE PRICE 11,000.00 SFR ISSUE PRICE 4.75 SFR
LISTING SWISS SE MIN EXER LOT 5000
